name: Thorntale
headline: Easiest way for post-sales teams to create data-driven presentations
description: Thorntale automates the creation and updating of customer review decks, enabling post-sales teams to build presentations in minutes instead of hours. Simply paste a URL into a slide to instantly create a brand-colored chart in your deck. The charts are interactive and modifiable mid-presentation, allowing you to answer customer questions on the spot and adjust charts without needing to consult the data team.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:productivity; industry:collaboration; industry:data-visualization; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ellen Hui, Founder
founders.description: Previously big data at Microsoft, SRE at Cruise, distributed systems and real-time video at Mux; now backend and infrastructure at Thorntale (W24).

founders.name: John Stimac, Founder
founders.description: Frontend, backend, and data engineer. Previously worked on big data at Yelp, and built the entire data platform at Clockwise.

[Log In](https://thorntale.com/<https:/app.thorntale.com/>)[Get Started](https://thorntale.com/<https:/app.thorntale.com/>)
# Present your best
Sales Pitch
Thorntale slide decks look better, and make you look better too.
![](https://thorntale.com/hero/sales_pitch.webp)
[Get Started](https://thorntale.com/<https:/app.thorntale.com/>)[Learn More](https://thorntale.com/<https:/docs.thorntale.com/>)[Book a Demo](https://thorntale.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/3xd-4y9-km2/chat-with-thorntale>)
### Presentation Matters.
Tell your story, without fighting with your slides. Thorntale handles the details so that you can focus on the content.
With Thorntale’s design library, your deck will always look pixel-perfect. (Even if that teammate gets their hands on it.)
![](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fbobcats_slide.png&w=1920&q=75)
### A head start is half the battle.
There is nothing we dread more than a blank page.
We’ve been in your shoes before. It’s time to ditch them for some new kicks; step into our curated template library and make anything your own.
![](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fartist_portfolio_template.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Be half-hearted Be  pieced together at 2am Be  lackluster Be  Memorable.
Other presentation templates start strong, but fall apart once you adapt them to your own content. Not Thorntale’s.
Collaborate with your teammates in real-time, and we’ll make sure your deck looks just right no matter how many people are involved.
![](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fmultiedit_slide.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Make Your Presentations Stand Out.
Your audience can tell when you're nervous. Give yourself zero reasons to be.
[Get Started](https://thorntale.com/<https:/app.thorntale.com/>)[Learn More](https://thorntale.com/<https:/docs.thorntale.com/>)[Book a Demo](https://thorntale.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/3xd-4y9-km2/chat-with-thorntale>)
### Effortlessly align presentations with your brand.
Our customizable themes ensure that every heading, bullet point, chart, and slide fits your aesthetic.
![](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fgrid.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Your data: clean, consise, and captivating.
Create, customize, and present dynamic charts directly in your slides – no SQL or technical skills needed.
![](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fpretty_data_presentation.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Could this meeting be an email?
All Thorntale decks can be sent as beautiful, modern emails. Not attached pdf-exports that no one opens. A real, beautiful email, directly in your audience's inbox.
![](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fblog%2F2024-09-22-email-integration%2Femail.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Present the future.
Stay Updated
![Thorntale stock photo](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2FnoSlidesBackground.webp&w=1080&q=75)
## Thorntale Blog
We’re the world’s premier data visualization team. Read about what we’re up to.
![Image for article](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fblog%2F2025-01-13-new-templates-and-editing-experience%2Fhero.png&w=1920&q=75)
### [New Templates and Editing Experience](https://thorntale.com/</blog/2025-01-13-new-templates-and-editing-experience/>)
We've completely revamped our Presentation Templates to be more powerful, flexible, and discoverable.
We've also improved the editing experience, allowing you to style your slides how you like while our design system keeps everything feeling unified and professional.
[Read More](https://thorntale.com/</blog/2025-01-13-new-templates-and-editing-experience/>)
![Image for article](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fblog%2F2024-09-22-email-integration%2Fhero.png&w=1920&q=75)
### [Send Better Emails!](https://thorntale.com/</blog/2024-09-22-email-integration/>)
The more touchpoints you have with your customer, the better. Emails are a great way to build keep communication flowing between meetings, but only if they're engaging, professional, and don't take forever to write.
That's why we built Email Integration directly into Thorntale; send your report to your customers with a click of a button.
[Read More](https://thorntale.com/</blog/2024-09-22-email-integration/>)
![Image for article](https://thorntale.com/_next/image?url=%2Fblog%2F2024-09-17-building-the-worlds-best-charts%2Fhero.png&w=1920&q=75)
### [Building the World's Best Charts](https://thorntale.com/</blog/2024-09-17-building-the-worlds-best-charts/>)
At Thorntale, storytelling with data is the priority, so we needed to make charts look as good as the rest of your content. We knew that choosing some off-the-shelf charting engine wasn't going to be good enough.
Instead, Thorntale is building the world's best charting engine, from scratch.
[Read More](https://thorntale.com/</blog/2024-09-17-building-the-worlds-best-charts/>)
![Thorntale Logo](https://thorntale.com/thorntaleLogoWhite.svg)
Backed by ![Backed by Y Combinator](https://thorntale.com/yc_white.svg)
### Be the first in line
Subscribe to receive exclusive updates and be the earliest to try our newest features.
Stay Updated

generated_description:
**Thorntale: Transforming Post-Sales Presentations with Data-Driven Insights**

Founded in 2024 and hailing from the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Thorntale is on a mission to streamline the way post-sales teams create presentations. In an era where data drives business decisions, Thorntale’s innovative platform allows users to generate data-driven presentation decks in mere minutes instead of laborious hours.

The core of Thorntale's offering lies in its ability to automate the creation and updating of customer review decks. Picture this: You simply paste a URL into a slide, and voilà—an interactive, brand-colored chart appears instantly. This feature not only enhances the visual appeal of your presentations but also equips sales teams with the flexibility to modify data in real-time, directly addressing customer inquiries on the spot.

With just a small, dedicated team of three, Thorntale has already made its mark as part of the Y Combinator Batch W24, receiving backing from prominent figures like Michael Seibel as their Group Partner. The company is buzzing with excitement around the potential of its product, which is tagged with keywords like ‘SaaS’, ‘B2B’, ‘productivity’, ‘collaboration’, and ‘data visualization’.

Their platform doesn’t just stop at presentations. Thorntale prioritizes user experience, integrating customizable themes that ensure every slide maintains a polished, professional look. The intention is clear: allow users to focus on narrative and content rather than getting bogged down by software complexities.

Key features include:
- **Curated Template Library**: A selection of starter templates to conquer the dreaded blank page syndrome.
- **Real-Time Collaboration**: Teams can work together on presentations seamlessly, regardless of their location.
- **Data Visualization**: Craft clean, dynamic charts without needing coding skills—no SQL required.
- **Email Integration**: Send beautiful, engaging presentations directly to clients' inboxes, making sure they stand out.

Thorntale understands that presentation matters. They provide tools that not only enhance the quality of content but also boost the confidence of those presenting. As they continue to innovate—with plans for expanded features and enhancements—their goal remains steadfast: to equip post-sales teams with the simplest, most effective ways to tell their story.

Curious to see what’s next? Check them out at [Thorntale.com](https://thorntale.com) to get started or book a demo to explore how you can elevate your presentations to the next level.
